prompt:
Summarize what you know about writing in the first person perspective for an online audience.
Writing in the first person perspective allows readers to connect with you on a personal level, which can make your content more engaging and relatable. However, it’s important not to overuse this style or else it could come across as self-centered or narcissistic. A good balance is needed between using "I" and sharing other points of view so that the reader feels like they’re part of the conversation too!
